notices.title: Classes in Irregular Spaces
notices.body: If you have any classes located in the New Dining Hall meeting rooms, please let your family know those rooms aren’t large enough to accommodate visitors.

lunchByGrade.label: Friday Lunch Flow (please follow these windows)

checkIns.detail: Regular check-in: 8pm Preps & Lowers, 9pm Uppers, 10pm Seniors

transportation.title: Return ride from Logan Airport (Monday, 6pm)
transportation.body: Advance registration required; closes Thu 10/9 at midnight. Sign up on myExeter → Resources → Campus Services. Questions: transportation@exeter.edu

fri.title: Registration & Name Tag Pickup
fri.location: Phelps Science Center, Grainger Hall, Tan Lane
fri.details: Reps from E&R Laundry, Citizen’s Bank, and Balfour Ring in the lobby.

fri.title: Cracking Teen’s Secret Code (Dr. Chris Thurber, CAPS)
fri.details: How to listen for subtext and keep conversations going.

fri.title: Global Initiatives
fri.location: Elizabeth Phillips Academy Center, The Forum (3rd floor)

fri.title: Open Houses
fri.location: OMA (Jeremiah Smith, ground floor); Learning Specialist (EPAC B023); Student Activities & Transportation (EPAC 2nd, 210); Parent Committee Coffee (Thompson Fieldhouse 2nd, Hahn room)
fri.details: Meet staff, ask questions; Assembly livestream available.

fri.title: Assembly: Serhii Plokhii
fri.details: The history of Ukrainian–Russian relations and the path to peace. Families welcome as space allows.

fri.title: Open Music Rehearsals
fri.details: Jazz Ensemble (Landers Hall); Concert Choir (Powell Hall); Chamber Orchestra (Bowld); Modern Music Making (Round Room).

fri.title: Lunch in Dining Halls
fri.details: Please follow the grade-based windows in the Friday Lunch Flow above.

fri.title: Meet & Greet your College Counselor
fri.details: Senior families: quick chats with counselors.

fri.location: Goel Theater, Performance Studio (3rd floor, Rm 306)

fri.title: Theater Open Rehearsals
fri.details: Macbeth (1st floor, Rm 119); New Plays Ensemble (Actor’s Lab, 1st floor, Rm 129).

fri.title: Open Music Rehearsals (Evening)
fri.details: 7:00–7:30 Exeter Choral Union (Powell); 7:00–7:30 Symphonia Orchestra (Bowld); 7:30–7:55 Concert Choir (Powell); 7:30–7:55 Symphony Orchestra (Bowld).

sat.details: Timeline, resources, support, and key dates.

sat.details: Meet the 9th Grade Coordinator, Deans, and CAPS representative.

sat.title: Conversation with Academy Leadership
sat.details: Principal Rawson, Vice Principal Page, Dean Foley, Dean Taylor, Director Bramlet.

sat.title: First Generation to College Family Gathering
sat.location: Phillips Church & Multifaith Center, Stuckey Room
sat.details: If your Exonian will be the first in your family to attend college, join for community.

sat.details: Make-and-take fall crafts, movie screening, open game room.
